Megatron:





"I will deal with that fool later. I believe he can handle things himself. I 
will send someone after him soon." Megatron said. He turned his attention 
back to Dracona. "But this Maximal I will have to be my first priority. Take 
her into Scoronok's lab, and give her an antidote."

Terrorsaur transformed to beast mode and flew off. He headed for the device 
that went flying out of Dracona's hand.

>::DarkMouse::
>She walked right next to Megatron.
>"Sir, just an observation, but Commander Quickstrike has been gone
>for a long while now.  He placed me in charge untill you returned to
>us.  I have tried haling Quickstrike on his comm, but no answer
>comes.  He called a long time ago saying he found something that
>would interest you, but you had not returned yet.  What are your
>orders?"
>
